title: F1 2026 driver line-ups: latest contract news and rumours
summary: Mercedes will keep its current pairing, while new team Cadillac will bring back familiar faces in the 2026 F1 driver line-ups. Here are the contracts in place, rumoured deals and who could end up where during silly season

qa_pairs.question: Which team is confirmed to retain its current driver lineup for the 2026 season?
Which new team is set to join Formula 1 in 2026?
What is the term used for the period when driver contracts are negotiated and changed in Formula 1?
